title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area, CRNRA, for short, brings out that curious, wondering side that grown-ups sometimes forget. With kids, it comes naturally. "Why is the river so cold?" "Do they really have Alligators here?" The park offers several activities for families, and for kids to do by themselves.  Be A Junior Ranger Collect Civil War Trading Cards
